title: When you just bought Aether Wing Kayle then Riot announces free Riot Kayle

replies.body: Rip Fitzky your wallet will be missed

Aether wing is a better skin anyway.

Id understand disappointment if the skin you got for free was better than the one you bought, but when its not as good I don't understand the disappointment.

Its like buying Spirit guard Udyr and then being gifted Definitely not Udyr. 
Cool you have 2 udyr skins, but the one you bought is still the best one.... So it doesn't really matter, you'll still mostly use the one you bought.
But for someone who doesn't like spending money on League it was a big waste for me and I wouldn't care about which skin I got either way
i have unmasked and since it got the splash update its my fav
